summary: THERE HAS BEEN A KNOCKING UNDERNEATH MY TRUCK EVERY TIME I HIT A BUMP IN THE ROAD AS IF SOMETHING IS LOOSE UNDERNEATH IT EVER SINCE I PURCHASED IT IN MARCH OF 2002. IT HAS BEEN TO THE SERVICE DEPARTMENT TWICE. I WAS TOLD THAT THEY COULD NOT FIND THE PROBLEM BUT THEY ALSO HEARD THE KNOCKING. I'VE ALSO HAD TO HAVE BOTH SIDE MIRRORS REPLACED DUE TO THE SPRINGS BREAKING.
